SEARCH
Package proj

Class Lecturer

java.lang.Object
proj.User
proj.Worker
proj.Lecturer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Lecturer extends Worker
Represents a Lecturer, a specific type of Worker user. This class holds information unique to lecturers, such as the faculties they are associated with. Lecturers are subject to the standard worker pricing model without any special discounts.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Lecturer

      public Lecturer(String mechNo, String paymentMethod, int contractYear, String faculties)
      Constructs a new Lecturer with their professional details.
      Parameters:
      mechNo - The lecturer's unique mechanical number.
      paymentMethod - The lecturer's preferred payment method.
      contractYear - The year the lecturer's contract began.
      faculties - A string listing the faculties where the lecturer teaches, typically delimited.
